operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Get all the containers configured in the system
operation.statusCode: User is not authorized to perform this operation
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Get the container configuration for container name requested
operation.statusCode: User is not authorized to perform this operation

operation.name: PUT

inValue.documentation: details of the container as specified by: org.opendaylight.controller.containermanager.ContainerConfig

operation.statusCode: User not authorized to perform this operation
Failed to create Container due to Conflicting Name
Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response

operation.name: DELETE

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response code 

Example:

Request URL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/containermanager/container/green

operation.statusCode: User not authorized to perform this operation

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Get all the flowspec in a given container
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Add node connectors to a container

inValue.documentation: The list of strings each representing a node connector in the form "<Port Type>|<Port id>@<Node Type>|<Node id>", as "OF|1@OF|00:00:00:ab:00:00:00:01"

operation.statusCode: User not authorized to perform this operation
Failed to create nodeconnectors. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response

operation.name: DELETE
operation.documentation: Remove node connectors from a container
operation.statusCode: Cannot operate on Default Container when other Containers are active
Failed to delete node connector. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Get flowspec within a given container
operation.statusCode: User not authorized to perform this operation
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: PUT
operation.statusCode: Failed to create Flow specifications. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response

operation.name: DELETE

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response code 

Example:

Request URL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/containermanager/container/black/flowspec/telnet

operation.statusCode: Container or Container Entry not found
Cannot operate on Default Container when other Containers are active
Failed to delete Flowspec. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response
One or more of Controller service is unavailable

group.name: ContainerManagerNorthbound
group.documentation:
Container Manager Northbound API

Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
Authentication realm : opendaylight
Transport : HTTP and HTTPS

HTTPS Authentication is disabled by default. Administrator can enable it in tomcat-server.xml after adding a proper keystore / SSL certificate from a trusted authority.
More info : http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/ssl-howto.html#Configuration
